mapper.insert: insert into t_org (id, org_type_id, org_name, parent_org_id, top_org_id, sequence, level_id, level_name, valid, org_path, create_by,create_tm, update_by, update_tm, version) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{createTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update t_org
org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_org_id = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
top_org_id = #{topOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level_id = #{levelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
level_name = #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_path = #{orgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_tm = #{createTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_tm = #{updateTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_org set org_type_id = #{orgTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_org_id = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, top_org_id = #{topOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level_id = #{levelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, level_name = #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_path = #{orgPth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_tm = #{createTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_tm = #{updateTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT org_name FROM t_org o JOIN t_org_level l ON (l.id = o.level_id) WHERE o.org_type_id = #{orgTypeId} AND l.level_name = #{levelName}
